text: @maddow @Happy2BNana Playing Russian Roulette with his constituents. He is now responsible for ALL deaths in his state. To ignore the reality that stay at home prevents the spread of COVID-19 is to live in a fantasy world. @AsaHutchinson is playing God with people's lives.
